meanings.definition: A person who delays or puts off action or decision.
meanings.sent1: The delayer always waits until the last minute to finish tasks.
meanings.sent2: The team was late because the delayer didn't submit the report on time.
meanings.sent3: The delayer joked that procrastination was their superpower.
meanings.sent4: Her habit of being a delayer turned the project into a never-ending journey.
meanings.sent5: The image of the delayer sitting back while others rushed around stuck in everyone's mind.

meanings.definition: To cause a delay or postpone action or decision.
meanings.sent1: Please don't delayer the meeting any longer; we need to make a decision.
meanings.sent2: The heavy traffic delayered their arrival at the airport.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected rain delayered their plans for a picnic.
meanings.sent4: His constant excuses delayered the completion of the project.
meanings.sent5: The technical issue delayered the launch of the new product.
